plot: Contestants are quizzed on general knowledge questions, the winner has the choice of picking a box with a mystery prize or building up their cash bank.
plot_en: Contestants are quizzed on general knowledge questions, the winner has the choice of picking a box with a mystery prize or building up their cash bank.
plot_es: Contestants are quizzed on general knowledge questions, the winner has the choice of picking a box with a mystery prize or building up their cash bank.
title: Pick-A-Box
